00015 
00016 class Boo_LoremIpsum {
00017     
00018     /**
00019      * @brief Array of paragraphs.
00020      */
00021     protected static $ps = array();
00022     
00023     /**
00024      * @brief Array of list items.
00025      */
00026     protected static $lis = array();
00027     
00028     /**
00029      * @brief Array of words.
00030      */
00031     protected static $words = array();
00032     
00033     /**
00034      * @brief Default constructor.
00035      * @param bool $preload Preload ipsum files.
00036      * @return void.
00037      */
00038     public function __construct($preload = false) {
00039         if ($preload) {
00040             self::loadFiles();
00041         }
00042     }
00043     
00044     /**
00045      * @brief Returns a string of words.
00046      * @return string The string of words. Will always end in a period.
00047      * @param int $count[optional] The number of words.
00048      */
00049     public static function getWords($count = 20) {
00050         $count = (int) $count;
00051         if (empty(self::$words)) {
00052             self::loadFiles();
00053         }
00054         
00055         $wordSize = count(self::$words);
00056         if (!Boo_Validator::isInt($count, 1, $wordSize)) {
00057             trigger_error("Count {$count} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00058             return false;
00059         }
00060         
00061         $string = '';
00062         for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++) {
00063             $string .= self::$words[$i] . ' ';
00064         }
00065         // remove ending characters
00066         $string = rtrim($string, ' .,');
00067         $string .= '.'; // add period
00068         return $string;
00069     }
00070     
00071     /**
00072      * @brief Returns an array of paragraphs of lorem ipsum.
00073      * @return Boo_Html A collection of paragraphs.
00074      * @param int $count[optional] The number of paragraphs.
00075      * @param array $attrs[optional] The attributes to apply to each paragraph.
00076      */
00077     public static function htmlPs($count = 5, array $attrs = array()) {
00078         $count = (int) $count;
00079         if (empty(self::$ps)) {
00080             self::loadFiles();
00081         }
00082         
00083         $pSize = count(self::$ps);
00084         if (!Boo_Validator::isInt($count, 1, $pSize)) {
00085             trigger_error("Count {$count} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00086             return false;
00087         }
00088         
00089         $html = new Boo_Html(false);
00090         for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++) {
00091             $tmpP = new Boo_Html_P;
00092             $tmpP->applyAttrs($attrs);
00093             
00094             $tmpP->setContent(self::$ps[$i]);
00095             $html->appendContent($tmpP);
00096         }
00097         
00098         return $html;
00099     }
00100     
00101     /**
00102      * @brief Gets an unorderd list of lorem ipsum.
00103      * @return Boo_Html_Ul The unordered list.
00104      * @param int $count[optional] The number of list items to include.
00105      * @param array $attrs[optional] The attributes for the unorderd list.
00106      */
00107     public static function htmlUl($count = 5, array $attrs = array()) {
00108         $count = (int) $count;
00109         if (empty(self::$lis)) {
00110             self::loadFiles();
00111         }
00112         
00113         $liSize = count(self::$lis);
00114         if (!Boo_Validator::isInt($count, 1, $liSize)) {
00115             trigger_error("Count {$count} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00116             return false;
00117         }
00118         
00119         $ul = new Boo_Html_Ul;
00120         $ul->applyAttrs($attrs);
00121         
00122         for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++) {
00123             $tmpLi = new Boo_Html_Li;
00124             $tmpLi->setContent(self::$lis[$i]);
00125             $ul->addLi($tmpLi);
00126         }
00127         
00128         return $ul;
00129     }
00130     
00131     /**
00132      * @brief Loads files into class.
00133      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00134      */
00135     private static function loadFiles() {
00136         // load paragraphs
00137         $pFile = BOO_LIB_DIR . '/LoremIpsum/ps';
00138         if (file_exists($pFile)) {
00139             $tmp = file($pFile);
00140             // removes line breaks at the end of each line
00141             array_trim($tmp);
00142             self::$ps = $tmp;
00143         } else {
00144             trigger_error("File {$pFile} does not exist", E_USER_ERROR);
00145             return false;
00146         }
00147         
00148         // load list items
00149         $liFile = BOO_LIB_DIR . '/LoremIpsum/lis';
00150         if (file_exists($liFile)) {
00151             $tmp = file($liFile);
00152             // removes line breaks at the end of each line
00153             array_trim($tmp);
00154             self::$lis = $tmp;
00155         } else {
00156             trigger_error("File {$liFile} does not exist", E_USER_ERROR);
00157             return false;
00158         }
00159         
00160         // load words
00161         $wordFile = BOO_LIB_DIR . '/LoremIpsum/words';
00162         if (file_exists($wordFile)) {
00163             $tmp = file($wordFile);
00164             // removes line breaks at the end of each line
00165             array_trim($tmp);
00166             self::$words = $tmp;
00167         } else {
00168             trigger_error("File {$wordFile} does not exist", E_USER_ERROR);
00169             return false;
00170         }
00171         
00172         return true;
00173     }
00174 }
